title: What should I do in Input?
content:
To continue building an existing ontology in ETC, get out of here and go to Task Manager (under Site Menu) and resume the existing ontology building task.

To start a new ontology, provide input files in this step. The input files must confirm to this format.

If you don't have files in that format, you can run Text Capture tool to generate such files.

If you have files in that format on your local computer, upload input files.

If you have files generated by Text Capture on ETC site, select an existing folder.

title: Create Input Files
content: If you don't have files in the required format, first run Text Capture tool to generate such files.

title: Upload Input Files
content:
If you have files in the required format on your local computer, use Upload Input Files option.

First Create a New Folder or Select an Existing Folder.

Then click on Upload Input Files button.

title: Select an Existing Folder
content:
If you have files in the required format on ETC site, use Select Existing Folder option.

Click on Select Folder button to select a Text Capture output folder, which has _output_by_TC_ in the folder name.

title: Continue working on an existing ontology
content: Get out of here and go to Task Manager (under Site Menu) and resume the existing ontology building task.
